Q39: What kind of training does your country provide for health professionals in relation to the national 
recommendations for newborn, infant and young child nutrition? 
 1   Pre-service (specific training BEFORE entering public health service or private practice)
 2   In-service (specific training DURING the course of employment)
 3   Both
 4   No training provided
 5   No information available
Pleas
